sentences.en: Approximately $150 million is to be spent on improvements.
sentences.cn: 大约1.5亿美元将用于作出改善。

sentences.en: Approximately 75 % of the earth's surface is covered with water.
sentences.cn: 地球表面大约有75%为水所覆盖.

sentences.en: Approximately one third of all patients with malignant disease have hepatic metastasis.
sentences.cn: 在有恶性病变的全部病人中,大约1/3有肝转移.

sentences.en: Can you supply this quality at approximately 50% cents per meter?
sentences.cn: 请问你们是否能够提供这种质量的，大约每米50%分？

sentences.en: Concrete was supplied from a batching plant located approximately two miles.
sentences.cn: 混凝土由距工地大约2英里的分批拌合厂供给.

sentences.en: Do any one of you know approximately how much higher it goes, if this ball has way higher mass than this one?
sentences.cn: 你们中的任意一个知道它近似高出多少么,如果这个球的质量比这个大的话？

sentences.en: Do any one of you know approximately how much higher it goes, if this ball has way higher mass than this one?
sentences.cn: ,你们中的任意一个知道它近似高出多少么,如果这个球的质量比这个大的话？

sentences.en: Double cream contains approximately twice the quantity of fat-soluble vitamins as single cream.
sentences.cn: 高脂厚奶油中脂溶性维生素的含量大约是稀奶油的两倍。

sentences.en: In approximately 1925, work began on the problem of suspension .
sentences.cn: 大约在1925年才开始了关于悬移质的研究。

sentences.en: In approximately 1925, work began on the problem of suspension.
sentences.cn: 大约在1925年才开始了关于悬移质的研究.

sentences.en: In the course of the 1930s steel production in Britain approximately doubled.
sentences.cn: 在20世纪30年代，英国的钢铁产量几乎翻了一番。

sentences.en: On some systems the time is a true count of milliseconds, changing approximately every millisecond.
sentences.cn: 在一些系统上，时间是真正的毫 秒计数，大约每一毫秒改变一次。

sentences.en: Our English teacher is approximately in her forties.
sentences.cn: 我们英语老师有40岁模样.

sentences.en: Take approximately 60mg up to four times a day, unless advised otherwise by a doctor.
sentences.cn: 每次服用大约60毫克，每天最多4次，或遵医嘱。

sentences.en: The conservatory measures approximately 13ft x 16ft.
sentences.cn: 温室的大小大约是13英尺乘16英尺。

sentences.en: The journey took approximately seven hours.
sentences.cn: 旅程大约花了七个小时。

sentences.en: The recovery of added methylmercury was reported to be approximately 90 %.
sentences.cn: 添加的甲基汞的回收率据报到达90%左右.

sentences.en: The yolk contains all the fat and approximately half of the protein of the egg.
sentences.cn: 蛋黄含有鸡蛋中全部的脂肪和大约一半的蛋白质。

sentences.en: There are approximately 1, 000,000 people in the city.
sentences.cn: 全市人口估计大约有一百万。

sentences.en: There are approximately 12 million migrants with their dependants living in the EU countries.
sentences.cn: 大约有1200万流动工人带着家属居住在欧盟诸国.

sentences.en: There are approximately one million people in the city.
sentences.cn: 全市人口估计大约有一百万。

sentences.en: This is certainly true for a plane mirror but it is only approximately the case for other configurations .
sentences.cn: 对于平面镜这肯定是对的，但是对于其它形状的反射镜则情况只是近似如此。

words.tran_cn: [数] 近似法；接近；[数] 近似值

trans.tran_en: used to show that sth is almost, but not completely, accurate or correct
